meta.title: Pablo Karam | Fullstack Developer
meta.description: Fullstack developer specializing in front-end, React, Next.js, TypeScript, and UI/UX design. Complete web solutions for modern projects.
meta.creator: José Pablo Karam

description.description: I turn business ideas into unique digital experiences.

methodology.title: My Creative Process
methodology.subtitle: Transforming business ideas from concept to reality

research.title: Understanding
research.description: I thoroughly analyze business goals and user needs to clearly define the scope and requirements of the project.

visualDirection.title: Visual Direction
visualDirection.description: I define the visual identity of the project, exploring color palettes, typography, and UI patterns that will resonate with users and reflect the brand.

uiDesign.title: UI/UX Design
uiDesign.description: I create intuitive and attractive user-centered interfaces, with wireframes and prototypes that visualize the experience before implementation.

development.title: Development
development.description: I develop both front-end and back-end with clean, modular, and well-documented code, following best practices and standards.

testing.title: Testing
testing.description: I perform thorough testing at all levels: unit, integration, and end-to-end, ensuring functionality, performance, and security across the entire stack.

launch.title: Deployment
launch.description: I implement solutions with CI/CD in versatile and scalable environments, optimizing key processes and providing continuous support.

solutions.title: Areas of Specialization
solutions.subtitle: Technical skills to create digital solutions

solutions.title: Front-end Development
solutions.description: Primary specialization in front-end technologies to create dynamic, responsive interfaces with high performance.

features.title: React & TypeScript Ecosystem
features.description: Advanced proficiency in React.js, TypeScript, Next.js, Redux, Context API, and more technologies to create dynamic, typed interfaces with optimized performance.

features.title: Advanced Animations & CSS
features.description: Creation of interactive experiences with CSS animations, GSAP, Framer Motion, Three.js, and WebGL for interfaces with fluid motion and visual impact.

features.title: Cross-platform Development
features.description: Experience with Flutter and Dart to create mobile and web applications from a single codebase, delivering high-quality native experiences across multiple platforms.

solutions.title: Complementary Skills
solutions.description: Additional technical capabilities that allow me to approach projects holistically as a fullstack developer.

features.title: Web UI/UX Design
features.description: User-centered design skills, wireframing, and prototyping with Figma, creating usable and attractive experiences.

features.title: Backend & Databases
features.description: Development of APIs and services with Node.js, Express, and SQL/NoSQL database management to create complete fullstack solutions.

features.title: DevOps & Cloud
features.description: Experience with Azure DevOps, GCloud, Docker, and CI/CD to automate processes and manage infrastructure in cloud environments.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: Professional Background
aboutMe.description: Web developer specialized in creating exceptional digital experiences with over 5 years of experience in the financial and international sectors.
paragraphs: I'm a passionate web developer focused on creating intuitive, high-performance interfaces that transform complex ideas into exceptional digital experiences.
My approach combines advanced technical knowledge with a deep understanding of user experience, allowing me to develop solutions that not only work perfectly but also delight users.
With experience working in international environments and multidisciplinary teams, I adapt quickly to new challenges and bring innovative solutions to any project.

positions.description: Development of digital solutions for the financial sector, designing and implementing intuitive and high-performance interfaces. I've created banking systems using React JS and Flutter Web, optimizing user experience and operational efficiency. I implement agile methodologies to accelerate development cycles and ensure timely deliveries.

I developed complete web solutions for the international hotel and tourism sector. I worked with design teams implementing exceptional UI/UX experiences that increased conversion rates. I applied cutting-edge technologies and best practices in web development, creating products optimized for SEO with significantly reduced load times.

Participated in the development of internal systems and the automation of operational processes that increased operational efficiency. Designed customized solutions for construction project management, workflow digitization, and supply chain optimization. Response times were reduced and data-driven decision making improved.

I implemented data analysis solutions using Azure Cognitive Services for audio processing. I performed data cleaning and preparation tasks to ensure high quality inputs for analysis. I applied data treatment techniques to structure information properly and generated comprehensive reports to support evidence-based decision making.
